SimpleMetaDataType< DATATYPE > Class Template Reference
[Entity]

This class is a simple meta data type that holds a single DataType object and does no parsing of the contents of its <Type> sections. More...

Detailed Description

template<class DATATYPE>
class SimpleMetaDataType< DATATYPE >

This class is a simple meta data type that holds a single DataType object and does no parsing of the contents of its <Type> sections.

Member Function Documentation

template<class DATATYPE>
virtual DataTypePtr SimpleMetaDataType< DATATYPE >::getType ( DataSectionPtr  pSection  )  [inline, virtual]

This virtual method is used in the creation of DataTypes.

Once a metatype is found for the current data section, it is asked for the type associated with that data section.

Derived MetaDataTypes should override this method to return their data type.

Implements MetaDataType.

template<class DATATYPE>
virtual const char* SimpleMetaDataType< DATATYPE >::name (  )  const [inline, virtual]

This virtual method should return your basic meta type name.

Implements MetaDataType.
